title: KonstaMerkle
author: KonstaMerkle
content: Hi all, I am Kosta, a co-founder at Gamma Options and we are looking for option traders to try out our DeFi options trading platform, and give us feedback.Couple of key points: - decentralized option trading protocol (DeFi), buy/sell options - we provide margin with up to 4x leverage - we have a specialized AMM for options which uses concentrated liquidity in a volatility range (you'll love it if you're LP) - lend ETH and USDC and generate income through interest rates, very low riskBe sure to check our website here: https://gammaoptions.comWe have deployed Gamma App on a private GammaNet test network where you can practice trade. Just follow the instructions from our Getting started guide. Thanks. I'll try to keep this thread updated with latest news for Gamma Options project.PS. please feel free to DM me, connect with us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Telegram, Facebook, etc.
